lead_paragraph: In the small fishing village of Bolungarvik in the western fjords of Iceland, a story is told of a man who ran so far and so fast that he broke a treadmill.

headline.print_headline: The Nordic Journeyman Tasked With Taming Payet
headline.main: The Nordic Journeyman Tasked With Taming Payet
